thread.title: Watch Justin Bieber Get Crushed During Celebrity All-Star Game Over And Over
thread.title_full: Watch Justin Bieber Get Crushed During Celebrity All-Star Game Over And Over

title: Watch Justin Bieber Get Crushed During Celebrity All-Star Game Over And Over
text:
by Cameron McDonough on Sat, Jan 28, 2017 at 9:50PM 9,935 Tweet 
If you’re having a bad Saturday, we have something that should cheer you up. 
Pop star Justin Bieber played in the NHL Celebrity All-Star Game on Saturday, and he was on the receiving end of the internet’s favorite play when former NHL player Chris Pronger smashed his face in along the boards. Is it too late now to say sorry? #NHLAllStar
